name: Berserker`s Cowl
description: Enter a berserker state of mind, lashing out with increased ferocity at the cost of survivability.

name: Nether Crown
description: "Once worn by the first and only Arcanist king of Cairn, King Samuel Drake, before he was stripped of his title and executed for heresy by the clergy."

name: Wildcaller`s Cowl
description: Embrace the protective essence of the earth, raising armor and regeneration.

name: Anchorite`s Headguard
description: "An initiate`s helm for the Guardians of Menhir."

name: Eye of the Beholder
description: "A gazer eye worn by a mad witch obsessed with appearances and beauty."

name: Herald`s Mask
description: Your voice carries with it the command of kings. Few can withstand its power.

name: Mask of Delirium
description: Unleash the spirit of madness from within the mask, destroying the minds of nearby enemies.

name: Purging Gaze
description: "The world is filled with heathens and heretics and so, by the grace of the Luminari, it shall be purged of this damnation."

name: Wreath of Souls
description: "The spirits trapped within the circlet sometimes whisper secrets to the bearer, though perhaps not always with the bearer`s best interests in mind."

name: Cauldron of Excitement
description: "Too much excitement, one could say."

name: Glory of the Silver Knight
description: Banish evil with a mighty melee strike of divine retribution. Requires a melee weapon.

name: Outcast`s Hood
description: "You can`t help but feel as if the mask is staring back at you."

skill_params.state_name: Chaos Damage converted to Aether Damage

name: Empowered Anchorite`s Headguard
description: "An initiate`s helm for the Guardians of Menhir."

name: Empowered Berserker`s Cowl
description: Enter a berserker state of mind, lashing out with increased ferocity at the cost of survivability.

name: Frostshard Crown
description: Launch a spike of rock solid ice to impale your enemies.

name: Sharpshooter`s Glass Eye
description: A trained eye, a lethal shot. This is a ranged two-handed weapon passive bonus.

name: Baldir`s Mask
description: Spill the blood of the heathens that dare stand in your way.

skill_params.state_name: Fire Damage converted to Physical Damage

name: Bounty Hunter`s Hat
description: Capture your prey with a net that ensnares and constricts the target.

name: Circlet of Burning Rage
description: Blackwater Cocktails were concocted when more conventional explosives ran low. These improvised fire bombs leave a self-fueled blaze upon impact and are particularly effective against tightly packed enemies.

name: Corruptor`s Mask
description: The armor corrupts your soul, granting you dark power and greater control over your minions.

name: Empowered Herald`s Mask
description: Your voice carries with it the command of kings. Few can withstand its power.

name: Empowered Nether Crown
description: "Once worn by the first and only Arcanist king of Cairn, King Samuel Drake, before he was stripped of his title and executed for heresy by the clergy."

skill_params.state_name: Elemental Damage converted to Chaos Damage

name: Empowered Wildcaller`s Cowl
description: Embrace the protective essence of the earth, raising armor and regeneration.

name: Silver Sentinel`s Mask
description: Your target becomes marked with a blessed Luminari rune that seals their fate. This symbol is particularly effective against fiends of the void.

skill_params.state_name: Piercing Damage converted to Cold Damage

name: Terror of the Grove
description: "Cut from the hide of an ancient Thorned Horror."

name: Outcast`s Hood
description: "You can`t help but feel as if the mask is staring back at you."

name: Cowl of Mogdrogen
description: Fills you and your nearby allies with Mogdrogen`s tranquility, emboldening them and their beastly companions. This ability must be toggled to maintain its effect.

name: Cowl of the Blind Assassin
description: The Eye of Thaddeus exposes easy to exploit weak points on your feeble foes.
set_parts: Stealth Jacket of the Blind Assassin
Unseeing Eye of the Blind Assassin

name: Dawnguard Helm
description: A spike of electric energy erupts towards your assailant.
